0.1.name: wordpress/google-plus-badge-like-fb-like-box
0.1.description:
Google Plus Badge like FB Like Box which displays Followers profile pics, Follow button and +1 button.

Minimum Height and Width for the widget is 150 and maximum is 800, which is increased by 50. You can just select the height and width from drop down list.

Support / Contact

  • DEMO
  • Developer Blog: HowOpenSource.com

If you like this plug-in, please don't forget to rate this plugin.
